member.name: ID2D1GradientMesh.GetPatchCount
member.summary: Returns the number of patches that make up this gradient mesh.
member.returns: Returns the number of patches that make up this gradient mesh.

member.name: ID2D1GradientMesh.GetPatches
member.summary: Returns a subset of the patches that make up this gradient mesh.
member.param: Index of the first patch to return.
A pointer to the array to be filled with the patch data.
The number of patches to be returned.
member.returns: S_OK if successful, otherwise a failure HRESULT.

member.name: ID2D1GradientMesh
member.summary: Represents a device-dependent representation of a gradient mesh composed of patches. Use the to create an instance of ID2D1GradientMesh.
